steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Put(number_in_box(7), into_box(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(4), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(4), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(6)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(3), number_in_box(1), put_result_into_box(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(8), 2), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(2), then_go_to_step(7)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(8), 2), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(8)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(2)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(2)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 6?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在6号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Put ( number in box 7 ) into box 4
Change Instruction 4: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 4 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Multiply: ( number in box 3 ) * ( number in box 1 ), put result into box 6.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 8 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 8 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 6
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
